main.bio: I am a Freelance Developer who is very comfortable working remotly and have an ever curious mind when it comes to crafting code. While I try to resolve errors with as little personal time sacrificed as possible, I know when itâ€™s time to be aggressive, which critical issues need overnight solutions, and which ones need to settle.  My practice primarily focuses on JavaScript, and React.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Audio Visual Technician
work.description: Originaly I was hired for Crestview United Methodist in 2010 until they became a legacy Church for Violet Crown in 2019. The team at Violet Crown saw my work and extended an offer to have me on their team and I was delighted to accept. My primary duties are to create and run Pro Presenter presentations for the Sunday services. However I keep myself available for Funerals, Weddings and other organizations that rent out the facility.

testimonials.text: I have been incredibly fortunate to have had the opportunity to coach and mentor Tommy during his time at Austin Coding Academy. He attended my classes for both 311 and 411 JavaScript. In 311 he learned, designed and executed successfully the creation of RESTful APIs using Node, MySQL, Express and Google Cloud Platform. In 411 he created beautifully designed User Interfaces with React and Redux. Tommy worked diligently toward his goal in becoming a Full Stack JavaScript Developer. He was able to execute projects on his own and successfully collaborated with other students in contributing to a single project. Tommy sailed through the material provided and will be a great developer on any team he lands.
